TEXT.TITLE: HOG AND CATTLE SLAUGHTER GUESSTIMATES
TEXT.BODY: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 280,000 to 300,000 head versus 294,000 week ago and 303,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 120,000 to 126,000 head versus 120,000 week ago and 124,000 a year ago. Reuter
